name: Quantum Geometry
description:
Geometry Dash-like game.

Warning: the game is very difficult (it is an experiment for a youtube video). You will have to control several players at the same time. The probability of losing the game (when one player dies) varies depending on the number of players. 

Music:

Who Likes to Party by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4627-who-likes-to-party
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
